name: AN ELEGANT HOT PINK FUCHSIA JACQUARD PAISLEY PASHMINA SHAWL, WRAP, SCARF
description:
This is a stunning trendy soft Jacquard Paisley Hot Pink Pashmina Shawl. This scarf will add pizzazz to some of your business attire and add elegance to some of your best clothing and outfits. You can buy it for yourself or as a Gift. Also Perfect for Bride, Bridesmaids Gifts, Anniversary Gifts, Mother's Day Gifts, Christmas Gifts, Graduation Gifts, Birthday gifts, Prom, you name it. 

The fabric is made of a luxuriously sumptuous Pashmina and Silk fabric. It gives you a great feel on your skin, with a wonderful flowing drape. It is large enough to give you great warmth when you wrap it around yourself or your neck. It is light in weight and you will definitely love it.

The scarf measures approximately 70 x 28 inches. The edges have 4 inch tassels that add a modern touch to it.

Dry clean or Hand wash cold, then lay flat or hang it to dry. It can be ironed on low heat.

Feel free to contact us anytime if you have any questions.

Thank you for visiting Artieno Fashion Gallery.
